name: com.android.phone.otasp.OtaspActivationService
description: otasp activation service handles all logic related with OTASP call. OTASP is a CDMA-specific feature: OTA or OTASP == Over The Air service provisioning In practice, in a normal successful OTASP call, events come in as follows: - SPL_UNLOCKED within a couple of seconds after the call starts - PRL_DOWNLOADED and MDN_DOWNLOADED and COMMITTED within a span of 2 seconds - poll cdma subscription from RIL after COMMITTED - SIM reloading with provisioned MDN and MIN
